price: Sim! Juntar-lhos-emos, sendo Nós Poderoso para refazer-lhe as extremidades dos dedos.
arabic: بَلَىٰ قَٰدِرِينَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّسَوِّيَ بَنَانَهُۥ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: balā qādirīna ʿalā an nusawwiya banānahu
